# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. Our company has developed a unique product that has the potential to revolutionize its industry. Given its innovative features and high-quality standards, we believe it's worth more than just its monetary value. We're offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $950000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this investment carefully. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
